column4: ANYONE HAVE ANY IDEA?? i have 220gb partition and 2 gb RAM on the laptop and i m using livesession for resizing the parttion. And partition has 45 gb of free space and i am extracting a 30 gb partion from it. Now what do u think how much will it take???
